item.title: Publishing Obsidian via Github Actions
item.description: Background Story A few months ago, I started my own “Second Brain” (for which I use Obsidian). I really liked that I can structure my learnings and summaries from my lectures in a way I feel most comfortable with.

item.title: How To Host SPAs on Gitlab Pages
item.description: My old Setup During the development of my website I ran into some issues with my CI/CD-System. I used my own gitlab-runner on my server, where I also host some private services.
